attributes.action: Stop all road traffic from operating between the hours of 2100 and 0600hrs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To save the Planet something serious has to be done and a starter for 10 has to be to stop all road traffic from operating during the hours of 2100 and 0600hrs. This will have an immediate effect across the board including emissions and the production and use of fuel
